channel.title: Changing the combat exp rate on 667+
channel.description:
Hey guys, here is how to change the combat exp rates in Matrix 667 base, since it is "unchangeable" in the settings. Im still new to java so dont rage <3
1. Go to skills.java and find [CODE] public void addXp(int skill, double exp)[/CODE]
2. then scroll down to [QUOTE]if (player.getAuraManager().usingWisdom()) exp *= 1.025;[/QUOTE]
Below it, add: [CODE]if (skill != PRAYER) exp *= 75;[/CODE]
Then, replace 75 with any number (higher the number, the more exp gained..)
What this does: -The code you just added, will multiply exp gain by # you replaced 75 with, for all skills EXCEPT prayer, if you want to add more skills that exp will not increase by this number, replace " if (skill != PRAYER)" with:
[CODE]if (skill != PRAYER && skill !=SKILLNAMEHERE)[/CODE]
Replace "SKILLNAMEHERE" with an actual skill name... and there ya go...

Hey guys, here is how to change the combat exp rates in Matrix 667 base, since it is “unchangeable” in the settings.

exp *= 1.025;[/QUOTE]

if (skill != PRAYER) exp *= 75;

Then, replace 75 with any number (higher the number, the more exp gained…)

What this does:

Replace “SKILLNAMEHERE” with an actual skill name… and there ya go…
